plot: How would the city feel like if the walls stopped talking to us? Graffiti writers in different parts of Europe share their views on city space.
title: We Are Not Living in a Fucking Hospital
plot_es: How would the city feel like if the walls stopped talking to us? Graffiti writers in different parts of Europe share their views on city space.
original_name: We Are Not Living in a Fucking Hospital
plot_en: How would the city feel like if the walls stopped talking to us? Graffiti writers in different parts of Europe share their views on city space.
